name: afb_r6_q52a
title: Afrobarometer Round 6 Q52a - Trust President
description: Afrobarometer Round 6 - trust in the country's president. Responses include: 0=Not at all, 1=Just a little, 2=Somewhat, 3=A lot
details: This is an aggregated dataset indicating count of each response option per pixel. The Afrobarometer dataset contains African's views on democracy, governance, and other issues. Round 6 surveys were collected in 36 countries

extract_types_info.encoded: count of each question response per unit of analysis

extras.citation: BenYishay, A., Rotberg, R., Wells, J., Lv, Z., Goodman, S., Kovacevic, L., Runfola, D. 2017. Geocoding Afrobarometer Rounds 1 - 6: Methodology & Data Quality. AidData. Available online at http://geo.aiddata.org.
